title: Understanding Data Inventory Architecture
text: When considering a data inventory architecture, think about the various functionalities it should support. Consider the different types of data and metadata it might need to handle.

title: Flexibility
text: Reflect on how the architecture may need to allow for future growth. How can it be structured to easily incorporate new types of metadata and efficiently categorize personal data?

title: Data Crawling Capabilities
text: Consider the importance of being able to access and gather data from various known datastores.

title: Comprehensive Solution
text: Consider how a comprehensive data inventory architecture might integrate all these functionalities. What would be the benefits of having a system that supports extensibility, data crawling, and unstructured data discovery?
